attributes.action: Condemn Turkish government for arresting Kurdish MPs
attributes.background: The International Community will have to do something about president Erdogan violation of human rights in Turkey in the name of democracy.

rejection.details:
This petition seems to call on the international community, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action. 		

Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
